name: Hello World! (Srivats J)
description:
Note:Press F11 before beginning in your browser to play it the way it's meant to be played

INSTRUCTIONS:

(Grass grows only when spraying water in bottom lane,To avoid getting killed by smoke, shoot the factory chimneys from the middle lane)

Assume the role of a UFO to save the green planet!

Colliding with helicopters, buildingsand smoke cause you to lose

Controls:

UP and DOWN keys to change lanes

X key for water sprinkler to grow instant greenery and restore rainwater for flat roof houses (Increases score)

Z key for shooting bullets at hostile helicopters and the polluting chimneys of factories

(Note: Score decreases when bullets are fired. So be wary of spamming the shoot button. You don't wanna turn every single human being on the planet hostile, do you?
